name: vite-fullstack
description: Vite Fullstack Runtime com Atomic Behavior Routes e MCP integrado.

scripts.ensure-network: docker network inspect neurohive >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker network create neurohive
scripts.dev: npm run ensure-network && npm run ensure-mongo && vite
scripts.start: npm run ensure-network && npm run ensure-mongo && node dist/server.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.compose:up: npm run ensure-network && docker compose up -d
